description: A garden party cocktail is a great way to enjoy your evening. This drink can be made with tequila and bitters with some other ingredients. A garden party cocktail also requires fruit juices such as lemon juice or pineapple juice. This post will show you how to make the perfect glass of garden party cocktail step-by-step!
name: Garden Party

recipeInstructions.name: Pour all ingredients in a cocktail shaker except the ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour all ingredients in a cocktail shaker except the ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Dry shake well. Add ice and shake again until the shaker becomes cold and frosty.
recipeInstructions.text: Dry shake well. Add ice and shake again until the shaker becomes cold and frosty.

recipeInstructions.name: Use a Hawthorne strainer and strain the liquid into your favorite coupe or martini glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Use a Hawthorne strainer and strain the liquid into your favorite coupe or martini glass.
